Subskills.name: More Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Effective Steel
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Thousand Wounds
Subskills.description: Serrated chains now stack ripping them off violently when reaching maximum stacks inflicting bleeding on the target.

Subskills.name: Open Their Wounds
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Rust Poisoning
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poisoned on hit.

Subskills.name: Power over Precision
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by serrated chains decreasing attack rating.

Subskills.name: Experienced Gladiator
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Precision over Power
Subskills.description: Ignore a portion of target defense when using serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Rusted Throns
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Sweeping Slash
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect width decreasing the length of serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Pierce the Plating
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Chains
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash chains bouncing between multiple monsters on hit inflicting serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Rawest Power
Subskills.description: Perform a whirling attack hitting monsters around you with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Gladiator's Dash
Subskills.description: Dash forward a short distance before performing an area of effect attack dealing increased damagee.
